processingCommand.script:
cd ${HOME}/eod_scripts/maintenance
source /appl/murex/config/$MX_ENVIRONMENT.env.conf
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_DM_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_DM BD_ACC_JOURNAL_REP
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_DM_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_DM BD_ACC_RULES_REP
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_DM_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_DM BD_ACC_STLM_OWN_REP
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_DM_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_DM BD_ACC_NET_HIERA_REP
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_DM_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_DM BD_ACC_STLM_OWNN_REP
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_DM_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_DM BD_ACC_MMROVR_REP
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_DM_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_DM BD_ACC_SPLIT_REP
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_DM_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_DM BD_ACC_TRD_REP
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_DM_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_DM BD_DLV_EXT_REP
